Correct naming in GenerateCategoryBeans - (Task #606)

The methods to get and set the referenced bean are now always called
without the "bean" keyword. A getter with "bean" always returns the
BeanPropertyReference.

Added a null check to BeanPropertyReference setValue.

---
Task #606: Evaluate adding a BeanPropertyReference

timeline.bodyText: Why do we have to handle a Runtime Exception for the Category Factory but not the Property Factory. This looks a bit odd. Please have a quick look and investigate.
timeline.author: PhilMFischer

replies.bodyText: This is because the CategoryFactory uses the BeanRegistry, that throws the exception if we can't create the Bean. The PropertyFactory uses the PropertydefinitionsSwitch instead.
replies.author: JAmmermann-DLR

timeline.author: PhilMFischer
PhilMFischer
